txt.en: Neither Longbeards, Zhélruka, nor Stout-axes, a company of clanless dwarves known only as the Want-kin have made camp in Elderslade.

'You will stay? Good!

'It is a tradition among us Want-kin, albeit a new one, to celebrate those that join our little company and those that depart it. In this case, you will have done both. Now, it may not be as lavish as the celebrations you are accustomed to... but we know a bit about good food, good company, and the comfort of a warm fire!

'Let us make a few preparations and then the celebration shall begin!'
Nagli Want-kin can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nNagli Want-kin and most of his companions kindly bid you farewell at an unexpected party of sorts. You should talk to Nagli Want-kin.
Talk to Nagli Want-kin at Khadâsh-gâra
Nagli Want-kin can be found at Khadâsh-gâra.\n\nNagli Want-kin and his companions would like to see you off from Khadâsh-gâra. You should talk to Nagli Want-kin.
'It has been a delight having you among us. I only regret that you could not stay for longer!'
'Come along, [placeholder]. There will be time enough for adventures tomorrow!'
